name: Granulomatosis with Polyangiitis (GPA)
chief_complaint: I've been having nosebleeds, joint pain, and I feel short of breath all the time.
prognosis: Variable; can achieve remission with treatment but requires long-term monitoring for relapses and medication side effects
description: A rare systemic vasculitis affecting small- to medium-sized vessels, characterized by necrotizing granulomatous inflammation typically involving the upper and lower respiratory tracts and kidneys. Part of the ANCA-associated vasculitides.
